mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kb_team_members WHERE id= #{id} AND delete_status=0
SELECT * FROM kb_team_members WHERE team_id= #{teamId} AND member=#{member} AND delete_status=0
SELECT count(*) FROM kb_team_members WHERE team_id= #{teamId} AND member=#{userName} AND delete_status=0

SELECT user.name as userName,user.email as email FROM kb_team_members members LEFT JOIN kb_user_registration user ON members.member=user.NAME WHERE team_id=#{teamId} AND members.delete_status=0 AND user.delete_status=0

SELECT team.id AS id,team.name AS name FROM kb_team team LEFT JOIN kb_team_members members ON team.id=members.team_id WHERE members.member=#{userName} AND team.delete_status=0 AND members.delete_status=0
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_team_members SET delete_status=1 WHERE member=#{memberName} AND team_id=#{teamId} AND delete_status=0
